The agency announced on Friday (Sept. 29) that it will keep New Horizons' lights on… [+4015 chars]

articles.title: James Webb Telescope captures stunning images of a neighboring galaxy - Mashable
articles.description: Barnard’s Galaxy is roughly 1.5 million light-years away
